fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm auto-upgrade restarts services when an update is applied
fields.request_details:
1. Prepare a test node that is one release behind origin/main so an upgrade is required.
2. Start auto-upgrade via `python manage.py shell -c "from core.tasks import check_github_updates; check_github_updates()"`.
3. Monitor logs/auto-upgrade.log and confirm the entry records `./upgrade.sh --latest` (without --no-restart).
4. After the task finishes, verify `systemctl status $(cat locks/service.lck)` reports the service as active.
5. Review System â†’ Upgrade Report to ensure the run completed successfully and note whether any manual follow-up is necessary.
